name: Glitched Out
description:
This game is a simple platformer with random lagging for... whatever reason. It is as simple as make it to the end, that's it.

This version of the game is a short and simple platformer for weekly game jam 201. Because of the time constraint, this game is very small, but in the future, we really want to create a glitched out 2 that is more developed with a ton more to do!

We hope you guys enjoy it!

P.s. there are 2 endings if you know how to get them ;)
